results.title: A case of metformin-associated lactic acidosis with cardiogenic and vasoplegic shock supported by ECPella.
results.text_hl: A case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@cardiogenic and@@@ @DISEASE_Vasoplegia @DISEASE_MESH:D056987 @@@vasoplegic shock@@@ supported by ECPella.

citations.NLM: Ling SK, Chung KW, Ma HY. A case of metformin-associated lactic acidosis with cardiogenic and vasoplegic shock supported by ECPella. Perfusion. 2023 Jun 5;():2676591231181851. PMID: 37272660

results.title: Sars-Cov-2 Infection as Catecholamin Crisis in Pheocreomocitoma: A Case Report.
results.journal: Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: A 63-year-old Caucasian male known for right adrenal @DISEASE_Pheochromocytoma @DISEASE_MESH:D010673 @@@pheochromocytoma@@@ waiting for surgical removal was admitted to the Emergency Department (ED) in March 2021 for a @<m>DISEASE_Syncope</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013575 @@@fainting@@@ episode and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ crisis that he never experienced before.

citations.NLM: Novizio R, Corsello A, Rizzo GE, Pontecorvi A, Locantore P. Sars-Cov-2 Infection as Catecholamin Crisis in Pheocreomocitoma: A Case Report. Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets. 2025 Feb 10;():. PMID: 39950294
citations.BibTeX: @article{39950294, title={Sars-Cov-2 Infection as Catecholamin Crisis in Pheocreomocitoma: A Case Report.}, author={Novizio R and Corsello A and Rizzo GE and Pontecorvi A and Locantore P}, journal={Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets}}
